𓃗 hippo ≈ 𒌈 ᴴIB.BA 𓄁 in

𒌈𒁀𒊒 ib₂ba-ru ibbaru 𒌆𒌈𒁀𒊒 uprząż 𒋢𒌈𒁀𒊒 ιπποσκευή ipposkeví "harness" @ hippo

𒍽 𒄊 ʳhuš rose Ross red rage ≈ •rouge

𒍨 ḫaš₂ ≈ 𓃗 horse in 𒍨𒁁 ḫaš₂bad 𓃗𓂾 "gallop" 𒍨𒁍 haš₂puˡ "pull the reins" 𒍨𒁍 ZIQ… zügeln

𒄒 hul₃ @ Gaul! hold! ring; rein ҳалқа halqa < кільце́ kilʹcé κύκλος kúklos #hullu

𒈥𒄩𒅆𒆠 Parhasi Persis (Fars province?) attested in Assyrian sources since the third millennium B.C.E. under the form: 𒁀𒊏𒄴𒋧𒆠 Parahšum Parahše "Land of the Horses" <> Perseus Pegasus Pferde
𒁀𒊏𒄴𒋳𒆠 Barhasi 'polity east of Elam' 𐎱𐎠𐎼𐎿 Pârsa Fars@Persis/Persia
